definition: to govern/to administer/to manage/to control/governance
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
corporate governance

sentences.english: This article clarifies the value of governance to application development teams.
sentences.chinese: 本文會嚮應用程序開發團隊闡明治理的價值。

sentences.english: Frontline turnover is one of the biggest headaches for call center managers.
sentences.chinese: 對治理者來說，一線坐席辭職是最爲頭痛的標題。

sentences.english: Governance plays an important role in Program Management.
sentences.chinese: 治理在程序管理中扮演重要角色。

sentences.english: All sorts of commonly-used technologies for controlling Cr-containing wastewater are presented .
sentences.chinese: 介紹目前比較常用的含鉻廢水的種種治理技術。

sentences.english: This paper studies on the relationship between the Ma Wusu sands control and particle board′s building.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述了毛烏素沙地治理與刨花板廠建設的關係。

sentences.english: And the diversity of university institutions is deduced by the society structure which it's in.
sentences.chinese: 大學治理的多樣性決定於其所嵌入的社會結構。

sentences.english: Part II The relationship between the Corporate Goverance and the protection of the minority shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分小股東利益保護與公司治理的關係。

sentences.english: China could also clean up environmental damage caused by underpricing resources.
sentences.chinese: 中國也可以治理由於資源定價過低造成的環境破壞。

sentences.english: The answer is “horizontal” and “vertical” governance approach.
sentences.chinese: 答案是“水平”和“垂直”的治理方法。

sentences.english: Governance should not be a set of static processes without any flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 治理不應該是一組沒有任何靈活性的靜態過程。

sentences.english: The cumulative amount of controlled soil and water loss area in Pingchang county, Sichuan province is 782.
sentences.chinese: 四川省平昌縣已累計治理水土流失面積782。

sentences.english: Yangzikeng watershed began its comprehensive control and exploitation at the beginning of 1992.
sentences.chinese: 楊子坑流域是1992年初開始進行綜合治理開發的。

sentences.english: This paper presents the method of treatment of waste water containing nitrophenol sodium from dye plant.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了染料廠含硝基酚鈉廢水治理的方法。

sentences.english: Cholera was recognized as an indicator of how well the environment is managed.
sentences.chinese: 霍亂被視爲可衡量環境治理成果的一項指標。

sentences.english: Development governance encompasses the software development lifecycle.
sentences.chinese: 開發治理圍繞着軟件開發生命週期。

sentences.english: Lack of stable business guidelines and governance for data quality.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏數據質量的可靠業務指導方針和治理。

chaos/madness
